name: Guvcview
description: Guvcview is an open source video software. You can use the camera to record your own video with negatives, mirror inversion, mosaic and other effects.

en_US.description: Guvcview is an open source video software. You can use the camera to record your own video with negatives, mirror inversion, mosaic and other effects.
en_US.name: Guvcview

zh_CN.description: Guvcview是一款开源的视频录像软件，您可以使用摄像头录制自己的视频，实现底片、镜面反转、马赛克等效果。
zh_CN.name: Guvcview
